links.title: Pluralsight plunges as billings deceleration concerns outweigh Q3 beats, upside forecast
links.description: Pluralsight shares are down 12.3% pre-market after yesterday's Q3 results, which beat estimates with 20% Y/Y revenue growth to $99.47M and break-even profit. The company also provided upside guidance, but the billings deceleration weighed down the good news.Billings were up 9% period over period to $100M in the quarter.
